code: import React from'react';import{Box,Button,Heading,HStack,Image,Stack,Text,VStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import'./home.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import vg from'../../assets/images/student.png';import{CgGoogle,CgYoutube}from'react-icons/cg';import{SiCoursera,SiUdemy}from'react-icons/si';import{DiAws}from'react-icons/di';import introVideo from'../../assets/videos/intro.mp4';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:['column','row'],height:"100%",justifyContent:['center','space-between'],alignItems:"center",spacing:['16','56'],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{width:'full',alignItems:['center','flex-end'],spacing:"8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{children:"LEARN FROM THE EXPERTS",size:'2xl'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:'2xl',fontFamily:"cursive",textAlign:['center','left'],children:"Find Valuable Content At Reasonable Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/courses",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:'lg',colorScheme:"red",children:"Explore Now"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{className:"vector-graphics",boxSize:'md',src:vg,objectFit:"contain"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{padding:'8',bg:"blackAlpha.800",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{textAlign:'center',fontFamily:"body",color:'yellow.400',children:"OUR BRANDS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{className:"brandsBanner",justifyContent:'space-evenly',marginTop:"4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CgGoogle,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CgYoutube,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SiCoursera,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SiUdemy,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DiAws,{})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{controls:true,controlsList:"nodownload nofullscreen noremoteplayback",disablePictureInPicture:true,disableRemotePlayback:true,src:introVideo})})]});};export default Home;
